channel.title: One week in on discuss.bootstrapped.fm
channel.description: Just wanted to share a little screencap from the admin area to show how amazingly you have all rallied around this idea and joined, posted and discussed us through an amazing first week of the forums! Thanks to everyone that's taken the bold step beyond lurker, introduce themselves and ask great questions. Thanks to @ian and @andrey for creating the podcast and giving a virtual watercooler for this community to gather around! Leaves me feeling like this ...

item.title: One week in on discuss.bootstrapped.fm
item.dc:creator: imsickofmaps
item.description:
Just wanted to share a little screencap from the admin area to show how amazingly you have all rallied around this idea and joined, posted and discussed us through an amazing first week of the forums!

Thanks to everyone that’s taken the bold step beyond lurker, introduce themselves and ask great questions. Thanks to @ian and @andrey for creating the podcast and giving a virtual watercooler for this community to gather around! Leaves me feeling like this …
